text: James Joseph Tarbuck (born 6 February 1940) is an English comedian, singer, actor, entertainer, and game show host. He was a host of Sunday Night at the London Palladium. He also hosted many game shows and quiz shows on ITV during the 1970s, 1980s, and early 1990s. In February 2020, Tarbuck revealed that, the day after his 80th birthday, he had been diagnosed with prostate cancer. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:English comedians Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television presenters Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Singers from Liverpool
title: Jimmy Tarbuck
